original_text: And when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.
korean_text: 그의 시체는 보지 못하고 와서 그가 살아나셨다 하는 천사들의 나타남을 보았다 함이라

sentences.original_text: And when they found not his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 몸을 찾지 못했을 때

sentences.original_text: saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels
which said that he was alive
